activities:
Columbus-McKinnon is a manufacturer of industrial equipment.  Our customers are businesses; however, during the course of providing our services and conducting our business we may receive certain personal data about individuals who are residents of the EEA, including customers, vendors, resellers, partners and clients.

Columbus-McKinnon also has employees in the EEA, and may receive personal data relating to employees (whether temporary, permanent, part-time or contract), former employees, independent contractors, or job applicants who are also residents of the EEA
contacttitle1: Assistant General Counsel & Chief Ethics and Compliance Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online, offline and manually processed; HR, customer, client and organizational data received from the EEA
recoursemech:
For HR Data: Cooperation with the applicable Data Protection Authority (DPA)
For all other data, or where dispute resolution with employees is not available with the applicable DPA: American Arbitration Association (AAA)
